      • scanStart

        public int scanStart(int flag)
        Open the camera module on the dock and open the scanning code
        Parameters:
        flag - 0: Dual camera on 1: Master camera on 2: Slave camera on
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code. Refer toErrCode;

      • getScanData

        public int getScanData(int flag,
                       byte[] recvData,
                       int[] len)
        Get the data read from the F310P dock camera
        Parameters:
        flag - 0: Dual camera on 1: Master camera on 2: Slave camera on
        recvData - Receiving data from the base camera
        len - The length of receiving data from the base camera
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code. Refer toErrCode;
